item.description: A wild burro dubbed Cupid is recovering from surgery after being shot with an arrow in what officials say is the latest in a series of a half-dozen at...

item.title: Indiana man charged with sending online threat that caused US Naval Academy lockdown
item.description: Federal prosecutors say an Indiana man has been charged with making a threat across state lines related to a lockdown and shooting at the U.S. Naval A...

item.title: A Black student was found hanging from a tree. Police say no sign of foul play
item.description: Police are investigating the death of a Black college student found hanging from a tree on the campus of Delta State University in Mississippi

item.title: New Hampshire Supreme Court to hear death row inmate's appeal for life sentence
item.description: New Hampshire's Supreme Court has agreed to hear the appeal of Michael Addison, the state's only inmate on death row

item.title: More than a dozen injured in Minneapolis shootings at homeless camp and near transit station
item.description: Eight people have been injured in a shooting at a homeless camp in Minneapolis, with four in critical condition
